markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slag May](/Feats.aspx?ID=1329) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your mother was an [annis hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=256), known for physical prowess, and you have one violet or steel-gray eye. You have thick, sturdy claws made of cold iron that grow naturally from your body. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage. Your claws are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group, have the [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) and [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) traits, and are [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375).
name: Slag May
